creator: christianjaicramos
title: IMPROVISED DYNAMO POWER SUPPLY(with charger ports,led light,mini fan)
description: This project is about creating an improvised dynamo power supply with charger ports, LED light, and a mini fan, using recycled materials. The dynamo can charge a mobile phone, light LEDs, and turn the mini fan's propeller. It also functions as a power bank by storing energy in a rechargeable battery when the dynamo is turned.
steps: Collect the necessary materials, including motors, gears, capacitors, battery, LEDs, switches, wires, USB port, cases, propeller, and a rotating knob. These are scavenged from old electronics
Connect the motor to the gears. Ensure that rotating the knob turns the motor's shaft.
Solder all the capacitors in parallel. Use solid wire for connecting and test each capacitor before soldering. Take precautions when soldering.
Fit the switch, USB ports, and LEDs into the dynamo case. Drill holes as needed.
Connect all the components according to a schematic diagram. Use a PCB for a tougher build.
Make the mini fan by using a mouse as a case. Open the mouse, create a hole for the motor, and fit the motor. Connect the motor and switches for on/off functionality.
Inspect the final product and enjoy its functionality.
